channel.title: The Dragonborn (Neutral Special, Kill one of the main factions)
channel.description:
Not the best. But not the worst. ***[color=red]Yes I feel like a nk team neut would help[/color]***
![Dragonborn|690x359](upload://7aovg8UYQdYhYsvxHYgmsGLayDW.jpeg)

item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
If you’re experienced in Design Technology you may be able to use GIMP to it’s fullest.
Otherwise I don’t really suggest it. Program is not very newbie friendly unless you want to spend some time learning it.

https://www.gimp.org/

Open-source, free ect. ect. basically the best image editor other than photoshop you will get.

item.source: The Dragonborn (Neutral Special, Kill one of the main factions)

item.title: The Dragonborn (Neutral Special, Kill one of the main factions)
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
I think a wincondition like that just fundamentally can’t work regardless of what kit you give it, because it requires you to rely on one other player not screwing up. You’re going to be completely dependent on the NK not being horrible. That’s a bit outside of the sphere of influence you can have and very anti fun to lose due to that.

Unless it would become the NK upon the NK dying. However that is extremely powerful and just exacerbates the balance problem that giving NK a straightup ally already brings.

Sorry to rain on your parade. I like the flavor and classcard graphic.

Read full topic
item.source: The Dragonborn (Neutral Special, Kill one of the main factions)
